text: Crash Tag Team Racing is a racing video game published by Sierra Entertainment. It was developed by Radical Entertainment for the PlayStation 2, Nintendo GameCube, Xbox and PlayStation Portable. A Nintendo DS version was cancelled. The reason for this is unknown. The game was released in North America on October 19, 2005 and in Europe on November 4, 2005. == References == == Other websites == * The official Crash Tag Team Racing website * Category:2005 video games Category:Crash Bandicoot (video game series) Category:Kart racing video games Category:Nintendo GameCube games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:PlayStation Portable games Category:Racing video games Category:Vehicular combat games Category:Xbox games
title: Crash Tag Team Racing
